title: Has Facebook outgrown its usefulness as a Social Network? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. But it depends on WHO is your target market, and IF your market on Facebook. If your ad budget is draining with practically 0% ROI — it’s not a Facebook fault :) May be it’s because you’ve built a wrong strategy or implemented wrong steps, did something wrong and didn’t control and amend your steps, budget. Sorry for truth.
